front.title: Using a Single IPv4 Global Address in DSTM

abstract.t: This document specifies an enhanced dual stack mechanism used inDSTM[1] by adding a new DHCPv6 option which provides a method toassign a single IPv4 global address with TCP/UDP port range to alldual stack hosts in DSTM domain instead of dynamic IPv4 globaladdress allocation. This enhancement to DSTM will result in a moreefficient mechanism to allow IPv4/IPv6 hosts to communicate withIPv4 only hosts using a single IPv4 global address only.
